title: Ep132: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Bluecoat 1944
itunes:title: Ep132: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Operation Bluecoat 1944
description:
Pete and Gary continue to tell the story of the 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry, a British WW2 tank unit, as they participate in Operation Bluecoat in July 1944.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free and receive special bonus content for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
